p:
Our analysis of health insurance claims covers nine years of influenza cycles (
2003
to
2011
, inclusively), see Figure 2. We visualized weekly, county-level prevalence as a movie (see Supplement); Figure 2A–H show a few relevant weekly snapshots from different years. The plates in Figure 2A–H, and especially the movie, clearly show that seasonal influenza cycles initiate in the South/Southeastern US and sweep the country from south to north. This pattern is repeated, with some variation, each season.
